meanings.definition: A storm of strong wind carrying clouds of dust.
meanings.sent1: The duststorms in the desert can make it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: People in the area were warned about the incoming duststorms.
meanings.sent3: The duststorms decided to play hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: The duststorms swept through the town like a hungry beast.
meanings.sent5: The duststorms painted the sky with shades of brown and gray.

meanings.definition: To be covered or obscured with dust from a storm.
meanings.sent1: After the wind picked up, the car was duststorms in seconds.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the attic was duststorms and forgotten.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to duststorms the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: Her old book collection was duststorms and untouched for years.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house seemed to duststorms memories of the past.
